name: Star Warmer
description:
Turn into the Star Warmer

Help to free the Starling’s homeland from the frost that seized it! Venture into the unknown of the frozen star to defeat the foes that rule it, get stronger to uncover the mystery that lingers hidden beneath the ice.

Feature List

  • Single-player Adventure
  • Playable Character armed for combat
  • Powerful skills that Level up
  • The Ability to slow down time
  • 2 enemy types and a Boss Fight
  • 2D Cartoon Styled Graphics
  • Mouse & Keyboard Support
  • Xbox Controller Support

DEVELOPED BY:

TEAM C (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 3, 2019/2020)
